doc.title: EXIF

value.content: The Exchangeable Image File Format (EXIF) is a standard that specifies how metadata about a multimedia file can be embedded within the file. For example, an image might contain EXIF data describing the: pixel width, height, and density, shutter speed, aperture, ISO settings, capture date, etc.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• EXIF (Wikipedia)
  • CIPA Standards, including "CIPA DC-008-Translation-2019 Exchangeable image file format for digital still cameras : Exif Version 2.32"
